Title: Sogou
Manager: J.P. Morgan/ Credit Suisse/ Goldman Sachs/ CICC
Business: Our mission is to make it easy to communicate and get information. We are an innovator in search and a leader in China’s Internet industry. Our Sogou Search is the second largest search engine by mobile queries in China and we are the fourth largest Internet company in China based on MAU in June 2017, according to iResearch. Our industry-leading Sogou Input Method, the robust ecosystem we have built and shared with Tencent and other strategic partners, and significant breakthroughs in AI uniquely position us to capture opportunities in China’s search and Internet industry.
